title: Website Redesign for NovaCorp
description: A sleek and modern redesign for NovaCorp's corporate website.
details: We transformed NovaCorp's outdated website into a sleek, modern platform that showcases their services, team, and achievements. The redesign features interactive charts, a responsive design, and enhanced navigation for an improved user experience. title: Galaxy Quest: Web-Based Space Adventure Game
description: An immersive, browser-based space exploration game.
details: Galaxy Quest is a web-based game where players explore the galaxy, mine resources, and build their own space empire. The game features dynamic graphics, real-time multiplayer interaction, and a captivating storyline.

title: E-Commerce Platform for FreshMart
description: A user-friendly online store for FreshMartâ€™s organic products.
details: We built an intuitive e-commerce platform for FreshMart, offering seamless navigation, secure payment options, and a personalized shopping experience. Features include a recipe finder, subscription boxes, and a rewards program for loyal customers.

title: Interactive Portfolio for ArtByAva
description: A stunning portfolio website for a digital artist.
details: ArtByAva needed a platform to showcase her digital art and connect with potential clients. We created a visually stunning portfolio site with a gallery, blog, and contact form, featuring a dark mode option and fluid animations.

title: SEO and Analytics Dashboard for GreenGrow
description: Boosting online visibility for an eco-friendly startup.
details: Our SEO optimization and analytics tools helped GreenGrow achieve higher search engine rankings. The project included keyword research, site performance improvements, and the integration of a real-time analytics dashboard.

title: Pixel Runner: Endless Runner Web Game
description: A retro-style endless runner game for all ages.
details: Pixel Runner is a fun, fast-paced endless runner game inspired by retro 8-bit designs. Players navigate through procedurally generated levels, collect power-ups, and compete for high scores. The game is fully responsive and optimized for both desktop and mobile browsers.
